mapper.insert: insert into omakase.comment(content, nickname, postId) values(#{content}, #{nickname}, #{postId})

update omakase.comment set content = #{content} where commentId = #{commentId}
mapper.select: select * from omakase.comment where postId = #{postId} order by createdAt asc
